content.text: What's up? I just got back from celebrating my birthday with friends at a bar in San Francisco.
That sounds like fun! I love celebrating birthdays with friends. What did you do at the bar?
We played some pool, danced, and sang karaoke. It was a great time!
Sounds like it! I'm glad you had a good time. What's your favorite kind of music to listen to while you're out?
I like to listen to a variety of music, but I really like listening to rap music when I'm out. It gets me pumped up and ready to party.
I love rap music too! Who are some of your favorite rappers?
I like a lot of different rappers, but I'm really into Kendrick Lamar, J. Cole, and Drake right now.
Those are all great artists! I'm also a big fan of Kendrick Lamar.
Yeah, he's amazing! What do you like to do in your free time?
I like to stay active and learn new things. I also love watching Game of Thrones and cooking.
I love Game of Thrones too! It's such a good show. I also love cooking. What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love to cook anything Italian. I'm Italian and I love to cook traditional Italian food.
That sounds delicious! I love Italian food too. I'm going to have to try your cooking sometime.
You're welcome to come over for dinner sometime!
Great! We'll have to plan a date.
